*Committing your project through Eclipse doesn't require you to use tortoisesvn or terminal which is very convenient and quick*

= Steps =
1. On the Project Explorer, right click your project folder
2. Select Team -> Share Project
3. Select SVN than click Next
4. Select Use existing repository location 
5. Click https://talking-points-3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk 
6. Finish 

Than, you will see an empty folder on the Source page in talking-points-3. 
You need to do the following steps to complete commit steps. 

7. On the Project Explorer, right click your project folder
8. Select Team -> Commit 
9. Write message for Commit 
10. Finish
